snippet.title: Football Manager 2022 | Release Date | #FM22 Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Big dreams realised through hard-work and skill is the ultimate FM story... Just ask Brondby fans who celebrated their first league title in 16 years. Or Clermont, who're playing in Ligue 1 for the first time in their history. And then there's Daegu FC who after just 9 years in existence have qualified for the knockout stages of the AFC CL. These are the moments that taste the sweetest.

Football Manager 2022 arrives November 9th on PC/Mac, Mobile and Touch, Xbox AND Xbox Game Pass.

Football Manager is returning to Xbox after a successful campaign last season and both FM22 (PC) and the Xbox Edition launch with Game Pass on Day One for the first time in the history of the series. 

FM22 Mobile will return to Apple and Android devices while platform information regarding FM22 Touch, including Nintendo Switch, is coming soon.

Pre-purchase #FM22 on PC/Mac anytime before launch to secure Early Access and net 10% off. Participating digital retailers only 👉 https://FM22.info/SegaApproved

Pre-purchase - https://fm22.store/PrePurchase 

For feature news, platform details and release information visit https://fm22.info/ReleaseDate. To get ahead of the game with first-looks, early insight and exclusive content, become a member of the FMFC squad http://fmfc.info/SignUp
